title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_One_Piece_Grand_Collection
transformers_text:
One Piece Grand Collection is a social-network game by Namco Bandai . It has 1 million users. [ 1 ]

Namco Bandai started work on the game with the goal of 10 Billion Yen in annual sales. Gameplay revolves around collecting figurines and forming battle groups to defeat bosses. [ 2 ]
